title: Increase the resistance values from Stat Shards and disallow stacking
body:
Riot admitted damage was too high and this pre-season has done almost nothing to alleviate that.

Even if you can get a somewhat meaningful amount of early resistances from the shards by stacking you're still taking Season 8 level damage from the other damage type. Meanwhile mixing both Armor and Magic Resist shards gives you such a trivial increase in durability that its hardly meaningful.

replies.body:
I think the mixing and matching being kinda crappy is intended. You can all-round but it won't be that good and if you stack 2 armour or 2 mr it counts for a lot more than the 20ad/ap because of how early armour works.
I may agree with your option for offence only but that may still bring in problems.
